numSensor.label: OUT 1 Current alarm Lowest measured value

enumMap.label: No alarm
I1: Current
I2: Current
I3: Current
In: Neutral conductor current
U12: Conductor voltages (1-2)
U23: Conductor voltages (2-3)
U31: Conductor voltages (3-1)
IP: Total real power
IQ: Total reactive power
IS: Total apparent power
F: Frequency
IPFL: Total inductive power factor
THD I1: Total harmonic distortion of current
THD I2: Total harmonic distortion of current
THD I3: Total harmonic distortion of current
THD U12: Total harmonic distortion of conductor voltage
THD U23: Total harmonic distortion of conductor voltage
THD U31: Total harmonic distortion of conductor voltage
HOUr: Operating hours counter
V1: Conductor voltages to N
V2: Conductor voltages to N
V3: Conductor voltages to N
THD IN: Total harmonic distortion of neutral conductor current
THD V1: Total harmonic distortion of conductor voltage to N
THD V2: Total harmonic distortion of conductor voltage to N
THD V3: Total harmonic distortion of conductor voltage to N
IPFC: Total capacitive power factor
I: Current I1, I2, I3
In: Neutral conductor current
U: Conductor voltages (1-2/2-3/3-1)
V: Conductor voltage to N (1/2/3)
P: Real power
Q: Reactive power
S: Apparent power
CPF: Capacitive power factor
LPF: Inductive power factor
THDU: Total harmonic distortion of conductor voltages (1-2/2-3/3-1)
THDV: Total harmonic distortion of conductor voltages to N (1/2/3)
THDI: Total harmonic distortion of currents I1, I2, I3
HOUR: Operating hours counter
F: Frequency
Internal module temperature
